headline: TRU Simulation’s Bell 525 Flight Simulator Receives FAA Interim Level C Qualification
summary: COLOGNE, Germany, November 17, 2025--TRU Simulation + Training Inc. today announced its Bell 525 Full Flight Simulator Interim Level C qualification from the FAA.
